backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor handling user profiles with authorization plus public submission and admin query endpoints for volunteer interests, contact messages, and donation pledges.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report describing required update for Economic Empowerment program locations and listing affected frontend file and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files including pages, components, hooks, styles, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and applying shared global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry template setting favicon, metadata, and mounting root element for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React router configuration defining layout with header/footer and all site routes.
frontend/src/components/FormStatusBanner: Reusable alert banner component showing success or error states for form submissions.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer component with organization info, quick links, contact details, and social media icons.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive site header with logo, navigation links, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating authenticated or anonymous backend actor and managing refetching when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication and login state using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useNgoSubmissions.ts: Defines React Query mutations for submitting volunteer interest, contact messages, and donation pledges via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom NGO-themed color variables and global styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the NGO’s About page with mission, values, and team member information.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation and submission along with contact info cards.
frontend/src/pages/DonatePage.tsx: Provides a donation pledge form with validation and showcases example impact amounts.
frontend/src/pages/GetInvolvedPage.tsx: Volunteer sign‑up page with form validation, submission handling, and a list of volunteer opportunity categories.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage featuring hero section, impact metrics, featured programs, and recent updates with navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramsImpactPage.ts: Displays major NGO programs with icons, descriptions, status, impact details, and locations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Represents project metadata, requirements, architectural notes, and known issues for the NGO website build.
